document_data.mainbody:
esgareth was a planewalking cambion who was once trapped inside Watchers Keep in Amn.
Eventually, he met Gorions Ward and tried to bargain. However, Gorions Ward killed him in order to collect the items needed to exit the keep.
Won in a game against his relative, Duke Rowan Darkwood, Aesgareth possessed a special deck of many things made by a genasi wizard.
